item.title: soul candy mission
item.content:encoded:
Hijinks Ensue
Robogirl and TicTac have a SNEAKY PLAN!

Crazy Plan!
Robogirl and TicTac have an awesome idea, and are already dressed for it. "Let's sneak in on the Soul Reapers and play a prank!"

Genjutsu
Sneak In
Robogirl and TicTac sneak into a bathhouse, and look back at you - "Follow us!"
.
Difficulty: 10 Successes: 3

(WARNING: Only Reaper and Innate abilities may be used here!)

Succeed!
"You shimmy through a steam vent and get inside!"
Ninjutsu

THERE IS NO FAIL STATEMENT. THEN DONT HAVE TO USE ANY JUTSU HERE.

Disguise Yourself
Robogirl and TicTac are now disguised as soap and a towel - "C'mon, hurry up!"
.
Difficulty: 10 Successes: 3

(WARNING: Only Reaper and Innate abilities may be used here!)

Succeed!
"You pretend to be a bottle of shampoo - and it works!"

THERE IS NO FAIL STATEMENT. THEN DONT HAVE TO USE ANY JUTSU HERE.

Taijutsu
Pranktime
Here we go - the two of them have dressed as a giant cardboard robot, and are going to bust into the bathhouse and take 'robopictures'. (whatever, just wind them up already.)
.
Difficulty: 11 Successes: 2

(WARNING: Only Reaper and Innate abilities may be used here!)

Succeed!
"You wind them up, and send them on their crazy way." <=== better use kido: iron maiden jutsu

Fail.
"You can't quite get the winder working, and the cardboard melts from the steam. Way to go. Back you go"

Taijutsu
GTFO
They come busting out of the bathhouse. "RUN RUN RUN!" they say! Then, everyone ELSE comes out of the bathhouse, and looks at YOU!
.
Difficulty: 6 Successes: 9

(WARNING: Only Reaper and Innate abilities may be used here!)

Succeed!
"You get the crap out of there before they set you on fire!"

THERE IS NO FAIL STATEMENT. THEN DONT HAVE TO USE ANY JUTSU HERE.

SUCCESS MESSAGE

ALTERNATE - 1 :
Robogirl gives you the thumbs up, and begins putting the pictures on the internet. TicTac, however, gives you a stinkeye. "I don't know if I like you enough to let you in on our scheme.."

Current TicTac friend level: >100!

He gives you the once-over, and smiles. "You are alright, kid. Here, take this!" He throws you a piece of Soul Candy. "This'll take care of your body while you are doing missions, so they won't be as stressful on you."

You may now do Reaper Missions without losing additional stamina!
